Oriental Pack

Contains Japanese, Korean and Simplified Chinese localizations. Size – 166 MB

  • Download https://zippyshare.com or https://multiup.org/
  • Use 7zip or WinRAR 5+ to unpack the archive to the game root
  • Run corresponding batch file to restore the language of your desire. It will run for a minute or two
  • Last step – edit valve.ini to enable your language (valid language names are: japanese, koreana, schinese, english)

No miracles here. Most of the each language pack content is identical. So I just use extensive delta-patching to restore the data from English pack to other languages.

If you want to install this Oriental Pack over my repack, you must have BOTH Japanese and English voiceover packs installed. Otherwise the patching will go south.

  • If you install only one voicepack, make sure to select the appropriate language in game settings, or you will see forever loading screens
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 12.7 to 6~7.7 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 10-25 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)

  • HDD space after installation: 13 GB (~14 GB during installation)
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2.5 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Play as Yuma Ilvern and stop the Empire from exploiting the power of the ancient dragons, including the soul of the Shining Dragon within you. With the help of your friends, realize your destiny, save Astoria, and unleash the strength you’ve always had locked away.

In the original game, previously released only in Japan, Imperial Princess Excella was an unplayable character, but in the new “Refrain Mode” in Shining Resonance Refrain, both she and Dragonslayer Jinas can be added as party members for a new experience – just be sure to save this for your second playthrough to avoid any spoilers! As an added bonus, all of the extra cosmetic items and side quests are included in this remaster.

Dragons were long thought to be extinct, and because Yuma holds the ability to transform into the Shining Dragon, he was taken as a captive of the Empire. With the help of the Dragoneers, Sonia, princess of Astoria, pleads with Yuma to aid them in their fight to save their land from the Empire’s dominion. Typically timid, will Yuma find the courage to realize the strength he has within him?

You can skip downloading of credits video and voiceover files you don’t need. You must install at least one voiceovers pack. Here is the list of such files:

  • fg-selective-english.bin
  • fg-selective-japanese.bin
  • fg-optional-credits.bin (contains a little meaningless game scene and wall of text on a black background)
